data.text:
This is by far one of the best hotels in Dubai.  Reception staff are outstanding, nothing is too much trouble and they are the most hospitable ever.  Between Sue and Alice at the two connected properties this place will always be home from home.  They always remember a face and go out of their way to make the stay the best they can. 

These ladies are a credit to the brand and the property and I highly recommend staying with them.  

The building itself is great and in a lovely part of town.  Nice access to the creek.  Pool is pleasant and food isnâ€™t excessive for hotel pricing.
data.title: The best hotel on old Dubai

data.text:
It was a great experience today, in skafos restaurant for ramadan Iftar, amazing decoration and setup, professional staff especially Mr Dilawar sales manager, I would really thank him for his great hospitality and welcoming. I recommend visiting canopy hotel by hilton for my friends and family it is a great place and view for family and friends.
Thank you again Mr Dilawar , great staff in the right place
data.title: Great place and staff by canopy

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent visit. We strive to make you feel at home and welcomed and we are very happy that you had a great time with us, we are very glad that you found our hotel team members are very accommodating ,we will look forward to welcoming you back in the nearest future! Sincerely, Best Regards, Mahmoud Elbendary / Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Mahmoud Elbendary

data.text: Stayed for 3 nights with my two children.  This is a lovely modern hotel in the Dubai Creek area.  We chose this as it was not too far from the airport (we arrived in the early hours of the morning) and was conveniently located for the metro (10-15min walk to Bur Juman metro station) which we used to travel to the Museum of the Future and the Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall areas.  We booked a family room which turned out to be two connecting rooms - one with a king double and another with two smaller doubles.  The rooms were clean and modern and very comfortable.  The buffet breakfast was excellent with a good choice of dishes with European, Asian and Arabic options.  As it was Ramadan there was an Iftar buffet in the evening which we had once and was also excellent.  The rooftop pool area was a lovely place to relax and we enjoyed some drinks and snacks from the bar here too. All the staff were very friendly and helpful.  My only real complaint is that smoking is allowed in the area around the pool - despite being outside it is still a confined area and it was unpleasant relaxing by the pool with someone smoking a couple of metres away.
data.title: Lovely modern hotel in the Dubai Creek area.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay with us. We strive to make you feel at home and welcomed and we are very happy that you found our hotel location is convenient for you and please accept our sincere apology and kindly be rest assured that your comments have been shared with the management and we discussed these essential points with the concerned department heads for necessary actions, we will look forward to welcoming you back in the nearest future! Sincerely, Best Regards, Mahmoud Elbendary / Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Mahmoud Elbendary

data.text: I stayed at this property with my family and our experience was wonderful. Ben the luggage porter was very helpful and housekeeping staffs were so polite and hospitable. Islam did some nice room decoration for us. Breakfast buffet was very good and we all enjoyed it. Hotel restaurants don't offer Indian food and ones near by are not so near. Other than that hotel is highly recommended for a stay.
data.title: Good Hotel, great staff
